response.overview: Anxos Efe presents the ultimate summer fantasy brought to life on 8mm film. Under the Spanish sun, on a deserted beach, one woman discovers what she wants to do for the rest of her life. Looking through the lens of her camera at her two friends, she becomes a pornographer for the first time.  Inspired by a real confession, Analoxica - The Summer I Became a Pornographer captures an intimate, sun-drenched moment on analog film to the sound of the camera rolling and the waves crashing.
response.title: ANALÓXICA
